item.title: createObject
item.description: SoftLayer_Scale_Asset_Hardware::createObject Pin hardware on a group. This can be done at anytime, whether the group is active or not. Overview Parameters Name Type Description templateObject SoftLayer_Scale_Asset_Hardware The SoftLayer_Scale_Asset_Hardware object that you wish to create. templateObject SoftLayer_Scale_Asset_Hardware The SoftLayer_Scale_Asset_Hardware object that you wish to create.
